title: LSEG Jupyter Settings
description: Settings for the LSEG Jupyter extension

enableAutomaticAuthentication.title: Enable Automatic Authentication
enableAutomaticAuthentication.description: Enable automatic authentication when using the LSEG Financial Analytics Python SDK. There is the possibility that other local scripts/apps could try to access the proxy web server and make requests using it. If this concerns you, you can disable the proxy and use one of the other SDK authentication mechanisms.

logConsoleMaxEntries.title: Log Console Maximum Entries
logConsoleMaxEntries.description: Maximum number of log entries to display in LSEG log consoles. Valid range: 1000-100000. Changes take effect when log console is reopened. Note: Invalid values are automatically clamped to the valid range.
